title: Unlikely Desire: A Foxxie Quickie
description: ~~ A Foxxie Quickie~~~  ~~Contemporary Erotic Romance Shorts to Fulfill Your Fiction Fantasies~~  The last thing Gia Thompson expected to discover a month before her wedding, was that her fiancé had created a profile on a dating website. When she decides to use creative means to catch him in the act, their confrontation goes horribly wrong.  When Anthony Rizzi witnesses their altercation, he can’t help but intervene. But it isn’t long before Anthony finds himself fascinated by Gia--the cute, petite woman he meets that fateful day. Will they discover that desire can arise from the most unlikely of circumstances?
author: Giuliana Fox
